full_summary:
# Re-Tendered Roof Replacement at RCMP Chilliwack Civic Building

## Invitation to Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in partnership with the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the re-tendered roof replacement project at the RCMP Chilliwack Civic Building.

## Tender Details

*   Reference Number: WS3770512015-Doc3814401592
*   Amendment Number: 3
*   Solicitation Number: WS3770512015
*   Publication Date: January 4, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: January 17, 2023 at 14:00 EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
*   Expected Contract End Date: June 30, 2023
*   Tender Status: Expired

## Procurement Details

*   Procurement Category: CNST
*   Procurement Method: Competitive – Selective Tendering
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Delivery Location

*   Region of Delivery: Chilliwack, BC

## Contracting Entity

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
*   Contact Information:
    *   Name: Ken Ngan (SPAC/PSPC)
    *   Email: [ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: Not specified

## Invitation to Qualify

This re-tender is for qualified suppliers who were previously invited to qualify for the Phase 2 solicitation. Only registered suppliers with the required qualifications will be able to submit bids for this project. The tender description and further details are available on the Commonwealth Connector Website under the reference number WS3770512015-Doc3814401592.

Note to the reader: There are multiple legal warnings, and red flag flags about the uniqueness or the legality of this tender depending on where you are from. I am providing the output as is in the endeavor to provide context to you. Request you to do your research completely before accepting any tender offers. There are multiple contractual limitations which may not be suitable for all.  Once again request you
